heading: Initial setup
text:
First, update package sources upgrade installed packages 
latest version:Install packages needed later setup.currently using Gnome desktop. minimal installation runAt moment, good reboot allow changes take effect.want use MAC address DHCP identification. , add 
following every NIC /etc/netplan/<...>.yamlTo prevent automatic updates open Software & Updates > Updates set
code:
sudo apt update && sudo apt upgrade -yysudo apt install build-essential git wget taskselsudo tasksel install ubuntu-desktop-minimaldhcp-identifier: mac
optional: trueSubscribed to: All updates
Automatically check for updates: Never
When there are security updates: Display immediately
When there are other updates: Display weekly
Notify me of a new Ubuntu version: For long-term support versions

heading: Home setup
text:
Many key programs installed using snap packaging format.
snap daemon requires user’s $HOME located /home 
local filesystem (see 
). need 
bind-mount alternative home location /home (setup users’ home
directories located external storage mounted /data). Create 
mount pointMount external storage /data bind-mount actual /data/home
directory /home. make sure changes permanent add following
/etc/fstab:good point reboot system.
code:
sudo mkdir /dataUUID=<replace-with-disk-uuid> /data ext4 defaults 0 1
/data/home /home none bind

heading: Add users
text:
Add new users withThis creates new user, whose $HOME located external storage 
default shell bash.ATTENTION: needs done bind-mounting home directory!

heading: Python
code:
sudo apt update
sudo apt install ipython3 python3-pip \
  python3-dev python3-tk python3-venv

heading: R and RStudio
text:
install R just follow 
instructions.install RStudio, first download deb package 
website. Navigate
download location runThe downloaded .deb file can now removed.Point CRAN mirror local IPCI CRAN mirror changing repo name
/etc/R/Rprofile.site http://Shr/SRV-CRAN/CRAN:cryptography install libsodium-dev package:
code:
# Need to navigate to download location!
sudo apt install ./rstudio-<replace-with-version>.deb
local({
    r <- getOption("repos")
    r["CRAN"] <- "http://Shr/SRV-CRAN/CRAN"
    options(repos = r)
})sudo apt upate && sudo apt install libsodium-dev

heading: Program installation
text:
Install Pycharm, Atom, Chromium using snaps. snap package manager
installed Ubuntu default, need install .
code:
sudo snap install pycharm-educational --classic
sudo snap install atom --classic
sudo snap install chromium
